description.0: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil â€” just like the last heroine who wielded it.

0.0: ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <cryo>100%</cryo> of ATK and dealing <cryo>200%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
